name: places/ChIJq5hGIKxZwokRmW-DNHH3tAU
adrFormatAddress: 450 7th Ave, New York, NY 10123, USA

originalText.text:
Their commercial on NY1 says they will reduce payment to IRS.

This is totally opposite.
These guys increase payment in the end.

I paid $2000, Bradley Dorin who was supposed to take care of my files .
After payment made they don't even pick a call or return call of voicemail.

So I decided to visit their office without appoint.

I met Bradley asked what's going on about not pick up call then he told me to send them checks of payment to IRS and said will reduce tax payment in the end.

They send IRS my checks later than due and that made more penalty.
I decided to send directly to IRS so that will get there before due.

The other day I asked about how is file about appeal, then Bradley said he's going to process.

6 months past, then no reply.

I tried call and left voice mail so many times but they didn't call back.

Finally they called back, I asked about process and their reply was they can't reduce no payment.

They didn't do nothing. Just caused more late penalty.

Selig told me if you have complain about this, you can sue us at court.

I couldn't believe what he said.

Stay away from them.

These Selig and Bradley Dorin is such a Scam

originalText.text: We have work with Selig for the last few years. We are for the most part satisfied with his work. We had an audit a year ago and they found a mistake and we ended up receiving a refund from the IRS, even the lady who did the audit was surprised. Brad is always there when I need to ask a question and to give his advice.

We had an audit a year ago and they found a mistake and we ended up receiving a refund from the IRS, even the lady who did the audit was surprised. Brad is always there when I need to ask a question and to give his advice.

originalText.text: I invested in a sports bar that went out of business about 2 years ago and the tax department starded sending me letters saying I owed $213,688 and they put out a warrant on me. I interviewed a couple of attorneys but didn’t feel comfortable with them and was totally freaking out.  I hired Selig & Associates because they know what they are doing and because David Selig knows everyone at the tax department. They filed papers for me and got my drivers license back and my case was settled.

originalText.text: It is very difficult for startup business to manage finances, tax returns as I was new to the business and one of my friends told me about Selig and Associates. I was nervous and confused to give them a call as I read few negative reviews about them online. I approached them and they took my case seriously and in spite of my poor knowledge about taxes and IRS, David Selig helped me a lot. They took time for it but at the end all was set. Thanks

originalText.text:
They took my case which was for taxes i owed from 1999 to 2004.  I did some equity trading while in college and lost all the money and never filled for taxes.  They told me how much i owed and i did all the paper work for the taxes.  I wrote all the trades dates and amounts. The only thing they did was to sent a letter to the IRS that they represent me and then the IRS sent them the numbers.  Then i worked for days putting everything together. We had a meeting they told me everything was good.  When i first hire them on September 9 2013   i gave them 50% of the amount we had agreed which was $4000 for taking my case.  They had told me that this was the first step.  After filling the taxes they only called me after 2 months to ask for more money and no information about my case i gave them another $1500.  Then after 2 months with no news for my case they called on January 15 and asked me for the rest of the amount. When i told them that i will need some news for my case before making the final payment they told me that they are firing me from their client and they will keep all information regarding my case. I was in shock i could not believe what i was hearing.  Not only i never heard anything from them regarding my case they took most of the money and showed me nothing.  As a customer the only thing i asked was to see some progress on my case.  I am taking them to court I WAS NEVER TREATED IN SUCH AN UNPROFESSIONAL MANNER.

STAY AWAY THEY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY AND NOT DO ANY WORK !!!!!!
